This guide is a simplified overview of all changes in the [[Caves & Cliffs]] updates ({{BE}} 1.17.''x'' and 1.18.''x'' releases), which assumes at least some familiarity with the [[Nether Update]] (''Bedrock Edition'' 1.16.''x'' releases).

Since Caves & Cliffs was released in 2 separate updates with various changes in between, the guide is split in 2 parts, one for each major update release.

* [[Bedrock Edition guides/Caves & Cliffs: Part I]] - 1.17.''x'' releases
* [[Bedrock Edition guides/Caves & Cliffs: Part II]] - 1.18.''x'' releases
